item.title: What Ozone
item.description: What is Ozone and how does it work? Ozone provides advertisers, publishers and their programmatic partners with a range of services for advertisers to reach audiences and for publishers to monetise their content and audience from advertising. Described here is a high-level overview of the programmatic ecosystem and how Ozone fits into this. Programmatic Advertising - at its most simple level PublishersPublishersAdvertisersAdvertisersAd TechAd Tech Next PublishersPublishersAdvertisersAdvertisersSSPSSPDSPDSPAgency Trading Desks / Managed Services[Not supported by viewer]DFPDFPAnalytics / Data / DMP / CDPAnalytics / Data / DMP / CDP
